description: Server-side entry point for handling HTTP requests in a Remix application, rendering React components to streams, and managing server responses with support for bot detection and CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main function to handle incoming HTTP requests, set CORS headers, detect bots, and delegate to specific request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the React app to the response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming the React app to the response.
